title: Filthy Beast
description: Olivia thought meeting her favorite author would be a fairy tale come true.Declan Hart was supposed to be what dreams were made of—insanely handsome, wealthy, and a man who could make her melt with the stroke of a keyboard.But Declan isn’t the man Olivia thought he was. While most authors would kill to have his success, the envy ends there. Declan Hart is broken. Scarred. A ghost of the man he once was. Olivia Evans is the last person he wants to let in, but time is ticking, and Declan only has so long before he runs out of it.One book could change his fortune, but this woman could change his life.
author: Vanessa Booke
